title: The Dumbf*ck
description: He wants a second chance. She wants revenge.Five years ago, na√Øve Waverly Matthews was a wide-eyed college grad. Then she met Walker Rike. Within minutes he convinced her to indulge in ways she never imagined.Waverly thought she had seen the last of him. She erased the time they spent together from her memory, but she never forgot how he caused her dreams to shatter after he finished with her.Walker Rike, turned out to be an arrogant, broody, bossy blue-blooded badboy with whom she regrets spending the best forty-nine minutes of her life.When he saunters back into her life he's committed to reconnecting.Can she get the revenge she wants or will history repeat itself?
author: Marie Stanley
